Package com.irurueta.geometry

Class KDTree3D

java.lang.Object
com.irurueta.geometry.KDTree<Point3D>
com.irurueta.geometry.KDTree3D
public class KDTree3D extends KDTree<Point3D>
Implementation of a k-D tree in 3D. Once a K-D tree is built for a collection of points, it can later be used to efficiently do certain operations such as point location, nearest points searches, etc.
